trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Reynoldsburg
There were no other sightings in Reynoldsburg on or around June 20th 1971
Summary: it was salcer shaped with rotating rectangal color lights going around it.
divs: Sighting Details my friends and I were standing in the front yard and we looked up and there was this ufo right above our heads, it made no sound and did not move. It had colored lights going around it,my friends father was in the in the same front yard of the house, we started yelling for him to look at what we were seeing but he never heard us, he was only about 15 feet from us. To this day I dont remember seeing it leave or us talking about it.It really scard one of my friends,I was like in a trance I could not believe what I was seeing! This thing was so close it looked like we could just reach up and touch it, it was beautiful!! I have been looking in the sky ever sense.
